short_summary: Purchase one (1) configuration E Front End Loader
description: The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement to purchase one (1) configuration E Front End Loader from suppliers pre-qualified with a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement WS4149837221 formerly E60HS-18LOAD/A only.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Front End Loader Configuration E
#### Reference: WS4130518605

**Publication Date:** 2023-09-12
**Closing Date:** 2023-10-06T14:00:00 (Amended)

The Correctional Service of Canada intends to purchase one (1) configuration E Front End Loader from a supplier pre-qualified under the supply arrangement WS4149837221. Suppliers pre-qualified under this arrangement will be invited to submit a bid for the above-mentioned requirement.

The following trade agreements apply:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

The tender description is as follows:

The request is for the supply of one (1) configuration E Front End Loader. Suppliers must be pre-qualified under the supply arrangement WS4149837221 formerly E60HS-18LOAD/A only. The deadline for bid submission has been amended to 2023-10-06T14:00:00. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

For further information and to become pre-qualified, please visit the following link:
Request for Supply Arrangements for Loaders - Tender Notice | CanadaBuys
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4149837221-doc4149961795](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4149837221-doc4149961795)

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* City: Gatineau
* Province: Quebec
* Postal Code: K1A 0S5
* Country: Canada
* Phone: None
* Fax: None
* Contact Person
